ctx: intros s0 a p sigma pa H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros s0 a p sigma pa H1 H2.
simpl in Hget; destruct (N.eqb a a') eqn:Heq.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros s0 a p sigma pa H1 H2. unfold state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset, s_produit_l. intros a' p' Hget. destruct s0. - inversion H2. - simpl in Hget; destruct (N.eqb a a') eqn:Heq. + inversion Hget; subst. exists n. split; auto. rewrite <- Heq; auto. + apply H2 with a' p'; auto.
